About

Hi There, my name is Kerrigan and I’ve been playing games for as long as I’ve been a mostly functioning human creature. I hope to use this blog as a comprehensive home for my reviews and as a place where I can share my thoughts on games with you.

I will also be sharing development of my own personal TTRPG game Ara as well as the resources you’ll need to run it yourself. You can find more about that at World of Ara
